Title: Increases the exemption of self-employment earnings from the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax from $50,000 to $100,000
Summary: Increases the exemption of self-employment earnings from the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax from $50,000 to $100,000.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting self-employment earnings of one hundred thousand dollars or less from the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax
